title: Perma Banned???
body: I mean, my main concern is how am I going to get my money back/transfered to a new acc

replies.body:
In no permaban situation can you transfer content or RP to another account, according to the [**Terms of Use.**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse)

Since this is a specific inquiry regarding an account suspension, you'll need to reach out via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Let me know if you have any questions.

It depends on what you were banned for. If you were banned for something like a charge back issue, or if Riot suspects that your account could be compromised, then you will need to contact [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) through a ticket to solve whatever the issue could be and get your account unbanned.

However, if you were banned for toxicity, then it's highly unlikely that you will get your money back. Permanent bans are only overturned if there was an error on Riot's end. Riot does not offer refunds period, nor will they transfer the contents of one account to another.

If you want to discuss your actual ban, you can make a thread in the Player Behavior & Moderation board.
